name: Yarn Cat and the Visible Light Spectrum
name_original: Yarn Cat and the Visible Light Spectrum
description: This game is a high school student-made game about Yarncat, the mascot of our school's Digital Media Club, and their dream. Their story is that they works at a dead-end office job, but wants something more fulfilling so they go home, and falls into a dreamy sleep, and wakes up and starts their own sweater shop! This game, Yarn Cat and the Visible Light Spectrum is about this dream of theirs! Play through the 7 stages of Yarncat's dream and fight past techno traps while bopping out to the game's student-composed original soundtrack! For those who go to our school, please enjoy this (very) locally made game, and to those in the club and friends who have helped, I hope you enjoy the result of your own school's and friends' hard work!
